summary: Removes unwanted effects acquired from killing various creatures around Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Went cave scrounging, killed a few dozen Draugr, saved, left your computer, went to RL (egad) and came back, loaded up to go do some more and ... and ... and, why are your eyes glowing?!

Been there, done that, got the mod to get rid of that and more! Â This mod gets rid of common effects stolen from dying creatures.

The mod has a 10 second cooldown on a load of a game or cell and then it cleans the player of any bad items (if the menu says you want it, as some are re-used for various game mods).
author: GuruSR
